textBox.richText: As it always happens when we do a long awaited release; a few things show up right after we release it. iWeb Buddy 1.6.2 is available for download. As always, if you run into any issues with this release, please let us know. Changes since last build: • Removed the obsolete Haloscan options. • Removed the obsolete Google Analytics Urchin options. • Updated Google Analytics to comply with the latest configurations. • Logs are now emailed to Zarra Studios using Mail rather than our own mail servers. This should make it work for more people. • Fixed a crashing bug when a site was repeatedly updated. You can download the latest from here. Please enjoy this release of iWeb Buddy and report any issues you may find on our new support forum at http://help.zarrastudios.com.
